scripts.test:setup: cd tests && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt > /dev/null 2>&1
scripts.test: npm run test:setup && cd tests && python -m pytest --tb=short
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:setup && cd tests && python -m pytest unit/ --tb=short
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:setup && cd tests && python -m pytest integration/ --tb=short
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:setup && cd tests && python -m pytest --cov=../lambda --cov-report=html --cov-report=term
scripts.test:watch: npm run test:setup && cd tests && python -m pytest -f
